biotools.summary: The tool consists of a collection of measures for validation of clustering solutions and algorithms. It has external measures, as the Adjusted Rand index, and internal measures as Figure of Merit, Gap Statistics, Within Cluster Sum Square, Consensus Clustering and more.

bioschemas.name: ValWorkBench
